Package model

Class movie

java.lang.Object
model.movie
public class movie
extends java.lang.Object
This class contains all the attributes of a movie and initializes the show class object to create a new show for the movie.
Version:
1.0

  • Constructor Details

    • movie

      public movie​(java.lang.String name, java.lang.String director, java.lang.String[] reviews, double[] ratings, java.lang.String showingStatus, java.lang.String Synopsis, java.lang.String[] Cast, int tSales)
      Constructor to set the values of all attributes of Movie
      Parameters:
      name - name of movie
      director - director of movie
      reviews - array of reviews of movie
      ratings - array of ratings of movie
      showingStatus - status of movie - preview, now showing, coming soon
      Synopsis - synopsis of movie
      Cast - array of actors in the movie
      tSales - total sales for the movie

    • createShowListing

      public show createShowListing​(java.lang.String dt, int screenNum, int cineplexID, boolean is3D)
      create a show for this movie, currently set to protected to be used by admin module
      Parameters:
      dt - date-time of show
      screenNum - screen number
      cineplexID - ID of the CinePlex
      is3D - bool true if the movie is 3D
      Returns:
      movie show object
